well i drank a lot of whiskey in my time

so if you see me and im lonesome and stoned
so far down the devils lookin high
im just trying to untangle my mind

verse 2
well i do what i do and i dont know why
but i do what i do til the day i die
no heartache for the ticket
so i guess ill pay the fine
tryin to untangle my mind

if you see me and im lonesome and stoned
